registry.title: Open Systems Interconnection (OSI) Network Service Access Point Addresses (NSAPA) Internet Code Point Registry
OSI NSAPA Internet Code Points for AFI 35
registry.note: OSI Network Service Access Point Addresses include an Authority and Format Identifier (AFI). The AFI values 34 and 35 have been assigned to the IANA ITU-T Recommendation X.213, X-Series Recommendations, Data Networks and Open Systems Communications, October, 2001.. Within this format a two-octet Internet Code Point (ICP) field is available for assignment by the IANA. All ICP values not listed below are reserved.
